text: Montreal River may refer to: == Rivers == ;In Canada * Montreal River (Algoma–Sudbury, Ontario), a tributary of Lake Superior * Montreal River (Timiskaming District), a tributary of the Ottawa River * Montreal River (Saskatchewan) ;In the United States * Montreal River (Michigan), a river in the Keweenaw Peninsula of Michigan in the United States * Montreal River (Wisconsin–Michigan), along the Wisconsin-Michigan border in the United States == Settlements == * Montreal River, Ontario, also known as Montreal River Harbour, a community in Algoma District, Ontario, Canada, at the mouth of the Montreal River == See also == * Montreal (disambiguation)
title: Montreal River
